It's been quite a while. Well, where to start? I was talking to Brandon's sister, Lynn, and we started kinda flirting. Gettin' nasty with it (surprised? I was!). I had to go back to work and she had to go, but just before she had to leave, she called me over to her and slipped me her phone number. She said "call me sometime." A few days later, I called her, and a couple of days in a row. I took her home once, where we watched Guess Who? with her mother. (we cuddled a little). We left with a firtive kiss goodbye. I came back a few days later as a surprise. But she had a headache. I haven't talked to her since, though I stopped at her work a few times. She didn't seem all that enthused, so I figured it was a bad time, and she might be feeling pressured. I've backed off for now. Don't want to be too aggressive. My Uncle doesn't approve of this, but what he doesn't know won't get me in trouble. She's a sweet girl, and (while she bears a strong resemblance) she is nothing like Brandon (Thank You GOD!!!!). So, I'm going to work out, a lot!!! I figure, since she's on the fence as to us being "Official" right now, If I make myself into the "Sexy Beast," she'll come over to my side of the fence. I've even got the clothes to take her breath away. My uncle gave me an AWESOME!!! leather jacket for my birthday. (THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU). I've also got a light paisley shirt (yes, paisley) which, while it reminds me a lot of Night on the Rocksbury, supposedly looks really good on me.

Anyways, so I've got that in the works. The next big event, is I can't get a hold of Alex. (Alex! Where are you?!!) I did get a hold of Teddy, and he seems to be working on The Toad Project. Wicked cool. Really excited to see how that turns out.

So, if I can build a case and force them to give me a rating, I will be eligible. (Yesssss!!) The reason I haven't written in a while is because of my lack of computer. My uncle took all my computer and gaming away, to force me to concentrate on my life. So.....anyways. 


I also went to an Audition, and picked up a part in the play Cat on a Hot Tin Roof. It's a play by Tennessee Williams. (he's a sick bastard). It's a comedy, though a black one. I play the part of a Reverend Tooker. Kinda a coward and a self-righteous church man (for me, that's more than just a stretch. Kinda ironic really). Anyways, that's my life as of late.


Well.....sooo long, and good luck people.

She went to Boston and then New York. Bad places to go if you don't know the area (not that I do, mind you). I hope she gets back alright. Well....(I need to find a new opening word <heh>) Today was a remarkable day (it would have to be, or why would I be writing?). To start off the day, I woke up, asked my uncle Brian what to do with my hair. He made me wait, and told me to work the bangs.Then he asked about the garage. FYI he had asked me to clean up the folks garage so that he could park his truck. If I did that, he'd buy me a battery. Anyways, he came over and showed me the mountain of shit I had to do for the garage. I had only an hour to do that and pick up Chaz (impossible). I told my family how impossible it was going to be, with the situation. They got all pissed off at me. I did some work and left. My folks understood after explaination, but my uncle didn't give a shit. He just wanted me to do what he asked me to. I didn't know yesterday what he wanted, or I'd have done it then!

Anyways, I left, picked up Chaz, and took him to his interview. He was pretty much hired. We were Stoked!!! He'll be working with me from now on! all of my shifts!!! Yesssss!!!!! "Score one for the good guys!!!" Anyways, we went back (because I forgot my computer) and got cigarettes, cashed my check, got my computer and his cd's. We stopped, got beer and celebrated. We also saw a movie. He now knows how shitty the Transporter 2 was. Anyways, we had a blast. We came to the Met, Got drunk out in the dark, and came inside.

This is gonna be good. I have a club thang with the Romainians tommorrow. Today has been a good day (after I left the house that is.) I also got the car battery. (Ha!! In your Face Uncle Brian!!!) Gotta go

Anyways, Meg want's me to go with them again on Friday so, I suppose I'll go again. They also want me to go with them on their last day in the U.S. and take them ALL to the Club. It'll be nice. Of course, I said yes. It'll be a good time (I hope).

Well....Yesterday sucked. Meagan never showed up to our little meeting. I talked to her later and she has decided to break up with me.....forever. Ouch. Went drinking that night. Partied with Pam, Meg, Leo, and her friend. We had fun. I got blitzed. I had.....let us say, plenty. Stopped at Dunkin Donuts for an hour. Talked with people. Sobered up a little. Drove home (stupid, stupid, FUCKING STUPID!). Cops arrested everyone else by that point, so there was no one on the road. LUCKY. Not doing THAT again. Stomache wants to claw its way out of my chest....I'm dealing with it, though. John made fun of my being a wuss about my stomach ache/hangover (I guess an increadible stomach ache counts as a hangover). Going back to bar tonight.

Might meet someone new. Probably not though. THough THIS time I'm going to remain SOBER. (for the most part) Hopefully tonight isn't going to be another of those "your gonna feel that in the morning" situations. Maybe a, "last night was fucking awesome" situation. Don't know how that is going to work.

Meagan is probably going to be happier without me. It's the best thing for her really. I can't help her anymore. I don't know if I ever HELPED her. She knows how to reach me. If, in three years, she still wants to date, she can look me up. Online, my address/number will never change. Don't want to think about that anymore. I'll end up in another self-pity fueled haze. I don't need sympathy. I don't really need pity. I need.....a new outlet. Somewhere I belong. Something to do. A place to focus what energy I have left. And to build more. Maybe then I'll be able to start living, instead of merely existing.

God, feel like I'm gonna barf again. Can't believe I'm doing this again. Ah fuck it. Gotta be done.

Well, Tonight, I'd like to give a shout out to Teddy. I'd also like a reply to my question: How did you make such a huge network? How did you make that many friends? I mean, shit, there are so many people who are interested in your life. How did you do that? I'd like to know. TELL ME!!!!! Anyways. I'll give a Shout Out to Alex. Hey Alex, when I'm hanging out with you, I swear, it's one of the few times in the last 3 years that I've felt alive. I mean, truly alive. Thanks man. Just in case I die before tommorrow, Alex, Teddy, You guys are my Best Friends. I'd do anything I could to help you guys. I've got your back, and I know you've got mine. That is a real comfort. Meagan, I'm sorry things didn't work out. Please regard me kindly. (you'll probably end up racking your brain trying to figure out what that means, heh!). I told you I love you. I meant what I said. And even though I must be seperated from you, I still Love you. My spirit will be with you, always.

I can't stand feeling like this....I don't know what's wrong with me. I mean, My head's all scrambled. When I think about her, I can't concentrate on what's around me. And when I start to worry about her, I get a sharp pain around where my heart is. Like a knife. I can't help worrying. I mean, I was talking to her about how wonderful I was feeling (first time in a long time) and I mentioned the bright horizons ahead of us. I told her that my new purpose is: Love. To experience love in all it's myriad forms. (save for a few....not going there). I want to gain more experience, I know that I will eventually reach one of my treasured goals. You see, One thing I want, before I die, is to meet The One. I mean, the person who completes me. A person who will love me because I am me, and whom I will love because she is her. I want to marry her, maybe have children with her. Grow old together. And when I mentioned that there have been and possibly will be many in between the here and that fateful time. 

She started talking in very small print, got all depressed. And logged out after saying that she hopes I find her. I know she was holding back tears on her end. Damn it Meagan! Don't you know that I love you! There is little that can be done to change that. And that probably will never change. Please, Please, be safe. I don't know where you are now, or what you are doing. But if I pray for anything ever again, it will be that you are happy. I want you to be happy, no matter what that takes, Even if it means that we won't be together again. I bend all of my thought and love upon you Meagan. 

Remember, from now into eternity, When you are feeling sad, depressed. When it seems the world is turned against you. Close your eyes, and look into your heart. I will be there, waiting to hold you, kiss you and whisper into your ear, "Meagan, sweetheart, don't worry. Everything will be alright in the end. You'll see. ::wink:: ) 

Laters.

Wow....I absolutely Love Vandread. That is, by far, my favorite obscure Anime movie of all time. At this point, it even beats out (dare I say it) Dragon Ball (Z) (GT)! It reminds me of why I am still alive. It reminds me of the things that keep me in this world. The feelings, and emotions that come with being in love, and in sharing your heart with another...and finding reciprocation in that....It is truly something to be treasured. I think I have rediscovered my purpose in life, base though it be. 

I may have goals, dreams, and aspirations, but those will come second to that one thing: My one true desire and the one thing I have my heart set on. It is the one thing that I will seek, until I find it, in this life or the next. It is the nectar of my existance. It is to find true love and happiness, with someone special. Someone who will experience things both like my and unlike me. A person who will love me because I am me, and whom I can love because she is her. And all the ones that will I will know between here and the day I meet my one true love.....I will share my heart with them, and pour my own love into them, until they can feel it as I do: At times, Bursting at the seams, ready to move out and take charge. 

I know it may be silly for me to feel that way after watching one anime series...But that does not change the fact that I do. Its moments like this, and the feelings I have, right now, at this very moment, that make life worth living. It is my ability to feel like this that makes me glad to be alive. Even when it is dark outside, and my twilight seems just around the corner, if I can remember this feeling, and all of the feelings like this, then I know I can pull through. It almost seems funny, how I can be sooooo down one moment, and so increadibly miserable, so wretched that I would desire nothing more than to be erased from time and space, from eternity and memory. And then, all it takes is one small thing, and I start seeing things in a different light, and I am filled with this emotion.....It nears Joy or bliss......The only thing that would bring me closer to it would be to have my one true love, next to me, right now. 

I know the future isn't set, and I don't know how this is all going to play out. It would be boring if we knew what was going to happen next, wouldn't it? But that is the great thing, because even though we know that there are going to be hard times, bad times, sad times, we also know that there are going to be good times, great times, and perfect moments. Even if we have to be a little shallow to experience the true joy of the moment, if but for that moment, then I would gladly bring myself closer to the surface. I don't think I have ever met someone who was truly happy and not a little shallow.....then again I have never met anyone who truly met either of those descriptions, so....who knows.......Wow. I think I have probably driven away any audience I would have had at this point............................................................................Oh well....La De DA.......

And, before I forget to mention it, I noticed several weeks ago, that someone wearing lipstick had kissed my driver side window......I am not quite sure who did that. I rarely think on it long enough to ask anyone. I mean, sure, I have plenty of suspects......Though, if I was there when this happened, please don't take offense, I just don't remember anyone doing it when I was there. As far as I know, it could have been Meagan, Britney or my Niece.....Though it probably wasn't my niece, since she's too short to reach that high, and, at 5 years old, probably isn't going to be wearing make up (if she is.....oh, boy...I am going to be seriously cross). The only reason she is even included is because she might do something like that. 

God, I am so happy......I better take a shower and bask in my happiness....before it fades into mediocrity.


Music:

Justice and (I don't know the name of it) themes from Vandread


Mood: Ecstacy



Sweet Dreams, peoples......Especially you Meagan. When you start feeling lonely, or depressed.....remember that I am feeling the same way you are......but seriously, if you start feeling that way, just think about how you feel when your around me (and I haven't pissed you off). Then imagine that I am standing right next to you. I put my arms around you. Kiss you on your cheek and whisper in your ear that everything is going to be alright. Believe me when I say if I could, I would. And in my heart, I already am.

Good night.

Laters.

Well.......(I know, I start talking the same way each time ;P ) Today was.....interesting. It seemed yesterday was going to be the icing on the cake so to speak. I was getting all depressed over Meagan, so I wasn't eating much and sleeping less..... So, at 3 am, I took a shower and when I went in my room to go to sleep, my grandfather sat me down and asked me if I was doing drugs. It really sucked having to convince him that I'm not doing drugs (they know nothing of what's been happening).....It's sweet that they were worried but sickening to realize that that was the first thing they thought. 

Then today, I go to work. Sometimes, Irony CAN be funny (it helps when you are not the one involved). Meagan wanted to work with Eric, and she was making today her last day.........Yeah....anyways, the Irony came to me when I realized that Eric was leaving at 1:00 and Meagan was coming in at 1:00. And then there was the part about today being her last day.....That sucks....I kinda felt the bottom of my stomach fall out on that one. THEN to top it all off, she leaves early. WTF!!! It really really sucked.

Another thing of note today was that I discovered that I actually made Meagan jealous....Wow....Didn't think 'I could actually do that.....hmm....It is curious though....and sweet. She can be soooooo sweet. I swear to GOD! It's like a line out of a movie, "Just when I think I'm out, They Pull Me Back In!".....Though kinder and far gentler. I could swear that it's just at the moment when I think I am healing, all of a sudden, she does something sooooo sweet, or makes me think of something, or says something, or thinks something, and it changes how I'm feeling about it. I mean, usually, I'm trying to back off, give her room, so that I can let go when she finds someone new, leaving little more than a pleasant memory, but.........it's times like this that make trying to do that hard.


I hate here dial-up connection....I swear the lag is killing me. I have absolutely no Idea what she is doing at this point....I can't even confirm her status at this point.

She even thinks that it's because I'm a slow typer that she can't communicate with me fast enough. I'm sorry sweetheart, but technology is on my side here. Let's see here: you are running off of a connection that can only transfer data at 56 kilobytes per second...that can be disconnected by someone else at any time.......whilest I am on a connection that can transfer....basically 54000 kilobytes per second, and cannot be disconnected by the service provider, so.....

;P

Anyways................God Damn It....She was disconnected, or something....I can't communicate with her...What the Fuck!!!


I hope to God she is all right.......O.K. I'm going to wait long enough to tell her I love her and post this on my Journal and Myspace.....

Laters people.

Greetings. Unfortunately this is going to be a rather quick posting, much to do not much time to do it in. Anyways...wow. Today was interesting, to say the least. Eric was alright, though......some old lady came by and told him she wanted to go out (she, as in someone else, not the old lady....["Things that make you sit up and go..........buwuwuwuwuwu"-Ron White]) Curious. John and Rhod were out having some sort of secret meeting on the picnic tables....unsure about what that was about. I'm almost certain it had to do with work (If it was a friendly conversation, they could do that anywhere. Even a private conversation could be done outside of work....this was definitely something to do with work....why does this worry me?....We'll see. 

Eric used John's headset (you know, the one no one else is allowed to use) so that there was four of us with headsets. I think he did it to avoid Brandon, though he flirted with Britney too.....tough call.

John sent Eric home (no, John had the uber-secret meeting a while after that), so that left me, Jeremy, Brandon, and Britney. Now, I don't mind so much that he sent Eric home, though I would have rather it had been Brandon....However, that put Britney on headset with me and Jeremy. We had some fun....Oh YEAH! It was great, I created the Jersey story and Britney's new Nickname (this time, John might not interfere, since he doesn't know what it means) You see, Britney told me she was all proud that she got to wear a Jersey at school, even though she (being a girl) doesn't play football. At first I made cracks at how she got the uniform then a new tale wove itself in my mind.

Combining the Exotic dancer, bumped up to call-girl, and the Jersey, I came up with this.: I asked Britney what number her Jersey was. She said #80....I said, "That's some advertisement!" She looked at me funny, then I said, "That Jersey was #80 right?" She said, "Yeah" "You know that sign that's outside of a lot of McDonalds." "No, which one?" "The one that says 1 million served." She turned red. "Yeah?" "Well, that's 80 satisfied customers." She got all embaressed and laughed. I said, "By the way was Eric #80, or is he #81?" She gott a little.....snippy for a few minutes. I continued to tease her about it, remarking that at the rate she was going, two weeks and she'll be in triple digits, one year, quadruple, and so on. She started her bumping up against me thing. So I started the whip my foot like Chun Li (from Street Fighter) and kick her ass (literally) The first hour or so of that she was pissy. When I wasn't as hard with it, she was saying she liked it....(kinky ;) ) Anyways, we were like this for the rest of the night. I swear, by the end of the night, we were swimming in pheromones (hormones released into the air, which, if properly applied, attracts the opposite sex. It's proven! It exists, both in animals [obviously] and in humans.) My heart was starting to go into my throat. I remember we got an order for A large Mocha Iced Latte, and she started to make it, she gave it to me and said, in her coy manner, almost giggling, 'Wanna do it?' I kinda off hand said sure, then, when I pieced it together 2 seconds later I kinda blushed. She was already blushing. Damn girl......wow.  We do get each other going, don't we? 

Another interesting happening, is that Rhod and Tonya called me into the office and told me that the girl they thought might be good for me (Ann) was interested in meeting me......O.K. Kinda apprehensive. I'm going to basically be going on a blind double date (never done that before. Hell, I've never been on a blind date before). They say I know her, but I'm not sure. They say she's a heavy-set girl, kinda like Heather was, but with much bigger breasts (would be awesome if I really liked huge breasts) She's apparantely not a super-model, but she isn't a fucking gorilla like Amanda. And She isn't as heavy as Pam, so I might be in for a treat. They say she has a great personality [if they have to tell you that, watch out. Though, they might be on the ball here. We'll just have to wait and see.]. I swear to God, if she's Fugly, I am soooooo gonna kick Rhod's ass!!! Then again, If she isn't as ugly as Amanda, she can't be Fugly, [I mean, look at Amanda's Sister.....if she didn't look so much like Amanda, she'd by fucking Hot] or maybe she is, just not to Rhod or Tonya. I hope this works out....pleeeeaaaaassseeeee let this be a good thing.)

Well....Things are looking up, a bit. To start off with, I ended up cleaning the basement for the folks....without them asking. They freaked out. My grandmother thought I was on drugs.
